      • ofEnvironmentVariables

        public static SphereClientConfig ofEnvironmentVariables(java.lang.String prefix)
        Creates a SphereClientConfig out of environment variables using prefix as namespace parameter. An example environment variable initialization with "PROJECT_NAME" as prefix: 
        
    export PROJECT_NAME_PROJECT_KEY="YOUR project key"
    export PROJECT_NAME_CLIENT_ID="YOUR client id"
    export PROJECT_NAME_CLIENT_SECRET="YOUR client secret"
        The possible suffixes are "PROJECT_KEY", "CLIENT_ID", "CLIENT_SECRET", "AUTH_URL" and "API_URL".
        Parameters:
        prefix - prefix of the environment variables
        Returns:
        a new SphereClientConfig containing the values of the environment variables.
